text: Traces Best of 2005–2009 is the second compilation album by The Gazette, featuring songs from 2005 to 2009 like "Reila", "Cassis", "Shadow VI II I", "Regret", "Filth in the Beauty", "Hyena", "Burial Applicant", "Guren", "Leech", "Distress and Coma", "The Invisible Wall", and "Before I Decay". It peaked at the nineteenth position on the Oricon charts. ==Track listing== ==Notes== *This album was scheduled to be released on March 23, 2011, but the release was delayed two weeks due to the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami. == Personnel == * Ruki – vocals * Uruha – lead guitar, backing vocals * Aoi – rhythm guitar, backing vocals * Reita – bass guitar, backing vocals * Kai – drums, percussion ==References== Category:2011 greatest hits albums Category:The Gazette (band) albums Category:Japanese-language compilation albums
title: Traces Best of 2005–2009
